Game.Name: GrandSlam - The Tennis Tournament (Europe)
Game.plot: The set count is even at two... you have a 6-5 lead in the final set tie-breaker... opponent serves... you blast a passing shot down the line! Victory! Work on your strokes and movement, try a few practice matches, then go for the championship!Cheat: Configuration ModeEnter the following Code at the Password Screen:("CONFIG" followed by dots)Cheat: Configuration ModeAfter a password, enter in periods (.) until you can't anymore.Cheat: Configuration ModeEnter the following code at the Password Screen.... GRAND.SLAM Then you should have 12 new men and 12 new women tennis players
